thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 27 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Western Securities Sets Aside Asset Impairment Provisions Against Leshi's Pledged Shares

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Western Securities Sets Aside Asset Impairment Provisions Against Leshi's Pledged Shares

organizations.name: brief-western securities sets aside asset impairment provisions against leshi

text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - Western Securities Co Ltd:
* SAYS IT SETS ASIDE ASSET IMPAIRMENT PROVISIONS OF 439.4 MILLION YUAN ($69.64 million) AGAINST PLEDGED SHARES IN LESHI FOR CAPITAL OF 1.0 BILLION YUAN
* SAYS IT EXPECTS THE PROVISIONS TO REDUCE COMPANY'S NET PROFIT BY 329.6 MILLION YUAN IN 2017 Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2sYTph5 Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3100 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
